availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Eliza Woolfolk Johnson Johnston (Daughter of George Washington Johnson)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Daughter of George Washington Johnson and Ann Eliza Viley Johnson. Married to Josiah Stoddard Johnston. Mother of George Washington Johnston. Household owned four enslaved persons in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District No. 1, p. 91. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District No. 1, p. 27. Find A Grave, "Eliza Woolfolk Johnson Johnston (1834-1901)," Memorial #96388761, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/96388761/eliza-woolfolk-johnston (accessed January 3, 2018).
